content.detailedDescription:
I was at home filming a music video. didn't notice anything at first until i reviewed the footage. shot in 23.976fps.
i saw something move fast on the top left corner of the frame.
i'm not exactly sure what it is. at first i thought it was a bird or insect.
maybe too big to be an insect as it goes over the roof.
felt confused as i was watching the raw footage.
content.summary: Caught while filming music video.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed and had just turned off the light to go to sleep. there are three windows in that room facing the front yard. they were all suddenly lit up by a brilliant light, brighter than anything i have ever seen. . at the same time through the top of another window facing east i saw a red light blinking and moving in sequence. the whole thing lasted 4-6 seconds. my house is located in the country on the top of a hill with no neighbors in sight.
i was completely stunned and it was a couple of minutes before i actually got up to look outside. there was nothing to be seen. my first thought was 'that was a ufo'. the more i think about it the more sure i am that it was a ufo. there is simply no other explanation.
content.summary: Brilliant light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on randolf rd in charlotte, nc at 35 mph near a light tower with red lights.  my passenger alerted me to nine orbs hovering over the road about 60 feet high by saying "what are those?'.  i slowed down noticed the tower and looked at the floating obs.  each orb appeared to be a non-rhythmic flickering light in the center of a transparent sphere.  the orbs were moving in a floating manner independently from each other.  it was dark, but the lights did not appear to be part of the same entity and were far from the tower.  from my vantage point, the left most two obs headed east at about 30 mph and eventually went dark.  the other lights were still illuminated but the flickering seemed more desperate.  i drove a quarter of mile and decided to turn back.  i found a parking lot, turned in and drove to the edge closest to the three remaining orbs.  i turned off the car and headlights and pulled out my camera phone.  the obs were still in place and going dark one-by-one.  i took one picture of the last orb before it went dark.  i waited a bit longer but there was nothing to see.  my passenger's account is similar, but she did not witness the two orbs heading east. additionally, she experienced fear.
content.summary: Witnessed 9 hovering orbs above a high-traffic road while driving south.  2 orbs sped away east bound.  all lights eventually flickered out.

content.detailedDescription:
On this evening my family and i were laying in our bedrooms when we saw a huge explosion and then our power went out...As we all gathered to the front porch with other neighbors we saw seven hovering aircraft objects flying slow in a straight line...When u looked up at them they were so bright like glimmering stars.....I then grabbed my ipad and started taking still shots....So i could enhance the images....As they flew over there was no noise...They were low flying maybe a little higher than treetop height....Every time the power would come on for like five seconds as another craft flew over we would see the transmitter explode with a shooting flame ....I live very close to where the electrical transmitter is....I was petrified as this is the second observation i have had with these flying objects...The first observation was when i was living n another part of staten island., new york....I was on my balcony and saw them flying but they would disappear into the sky as they stood still .....This time i lost sight of them as they flew over my house......I contacted the news my newspaper and no contact back......I needed to. let someone know.....
thank you,
a freaked out staten islander....
content.summary: On this evening our power transmitter blew where we were able to see the explosion it lit up our whole block and our power went put as these seven air rafts were hovering through the sky.....In a straight line...I have photos

content.detailedDescription:
It was 3:30 in the morning on august 1, 2012. it was an ideal time to use my telescope because there's less light pollution that early in the morning. i walked outside to make sure the sky was clear before getting out my telescope, and that's when i noticed an object going slowly across the sky. 'wow, if that's a plane, it sure is flying low', i thought. it was going slow as if it was doing surveillance. then i noticed the lights were different from an airplane, they were all red and going in a rhythmic blink, blink, blink, blink, blink around the craft. 

i live two blocks from the pacific ocean, and it was coming from that direction going east. lindbergh field (airport)is in san diego just north of me, and i'm very familiar with the flight paths of airplanes in this area. this craft was acting completely different from a plane or a helicopter. 

this is completely out of character for me, but i ran into the house, grabbed my purse and keys, and then jumped into my car to follow it. i had to run several red lights and stop signs as i zigzagged across town. i kept hoping the police would see me, or maybe i would come across another car, but there was nobody out that early in the morning. after 20 minutes i was on the outskirts of town, at the base of the mountains just east of san diego. that's when i realized the ufo was slowing down, and if i didn't slow down i was going right under it!

all of a sudden it stopped in mid-air. i quickly pulled over to the side of the road and turned off my car and headlights. the clock on my car said 4:00 am. i was terrified that it had noticed me following it. i scrunched down in my seat so it wouldn't see me, and decided i wasn't taking my eyes off this thing until i saw what it was going to do next. so there i sat for 45 minutes, watching this thing hovering in the sky about 20 feet away from me. and it was totally silent. this thing didn't make a sound, but my heart was pounding like crazy. 

after 45 minutes there was a bright flash in the sky, like the flash of a camera only much brighter. the ufo seemed to be getting smaller, but that didn't make any sense. then i realized that it was slowly rising upwards, and the higher it got, the smaller it got. i watched as it got smaller and smaller, and eventually it was so small it just blended with the stars, but i could still see faint red lights blinking around it. it was getting light outside and, no longer fearful, i started up my car and drove home. i was very emotional on the way home. the realization hit me that all those people who've said they saw ufos really were telling the truth. i couldn't believe what i had just experienced. i had to look one more time. i pulled my car over to the side of the road and there it was, amongst the stars, a tiny object with very faint red blinking lights. you wouldn't even notice unless you were looking for it. 

when i got home i felt i should call someone, but who? if i called the local police they would think i'm crazy, so i decided to call homeland security (as if they wouldn't think i was crazy.) i called the miramar station (san diego) and told the person who answered the phone what i'd just experienced. i asked if anyone else had called about it and she said no. i asked if it would've showed up on radar, and she said if it had she would've heard about it (but that doesn't necessarily mean she would've told me about it.) anyway, i just wanted there to be some sort of record of what i'd seen. 

that was almost two years ago, and not one day goes by that i don't think about it. i often look up to the sky at night and wonder how many others are out there that we don't know about, looking down on us, and masquerading as stars?
content.summary: Saw ufo flying close to ground as if doing surveillance. followed in my car. ufo suddenly stopped and hovered in mid-air for 45 minutes. flash in sky, then slowly ascended.

content.detailedDescription: Regarding my ufo sighting: i saw the big black triangle ufo from n.W. 4th. and n.W. couch st. hovering over the "big pink" skyscraper in down town portland oregon at the corner of s.W. 5th. & w. burnside street, it was either jan. 5 or 6 of 2009 around 9-10 pm. i watched it for at least 15 minutes hovering over 'big pink'; elevation approximately 5,000-10,000 feet, the size of the larger spaceship was about the size of 3-4 football fields across, and i saw a smaller version of the black triangular spaceship dock with the larger black triangular spaceship and together they slowly drifted off to the north. both spaceships were solid black in color and totally silent- i could not hear any sound coming from either spaceship. the size of the smaller spaceship was about the size of the length of 1 football field across. exactly in the middle of both spacecraft was a circular opening with the circular rim of the opening emitting a ring of light and the air below the circular opening was emitting light like it was ionized air. i saw the smaller black triangular shaped spaceship come up over the horizon through my window travelling slowly and at one point in time for several seconds many pinpoints of lights lit up evenly spaced all over it, then all the lights went out and then it moved out of sight from the vantage point of my window so i went outside to see it and that's when i saw the larger black triangular shaped spaceship, and watched the smaller spaceship dock with the larger spaceship. the smaller spaceship approached the middle of one side of the bigger spaceship and docked with it- like it had fit in to a wedge-like notch in the middle of that side of the big spaceship. both spaceships hovered over big pink building for about ten minutes then they both drifted west with the smaller spaceship docked on the trailing edge on the south side docked in the rear of the larger spaceship. at that time there was very unusual weather going on- windy and rain weather and pink flashes of light flashing through the sky; like an artificially induced weather storm to act as camouflage. then they moved slowly, maybe 15-25 mph. this triangular anti-gravity spaceship that travels around the world and has been the subject of news reports and online videos.
content.summary: Smaller triangle shaped aircraft observed appearing from horizon, meeting and docking with larger and hovering traingle shaped aircraft, then together they slowly moved away

content.detailedDescription:
I was in grantsville, md on an overnight visit to our getaway trailer in the woods, on the mountain with my husband. a very noisy hawk was circling above our traler, so i grabbed my camera and attempted to zoom in on it. the camera was poor quality, so i figured when i got home i would attempt to zoom even closer to the hawk and determine if it was a red-tailed hawk, or not. 

i did not notice, at the time, anything in the sky except the hawk. i noted the cluster of ufos at a much later date, when going through photos on my computer, at home. i noticed the circular shapes and first thought, wow, that must be a flock of birds way up there! but, after i zoomed in on the computer, i saw they were circular shaped, all the same size, and the sun was reflecting from the west (the same on all the ufos). my son had seen a similar formation, while topping a tree, about 100 feet up in the top of a tree, near wash. d.C.)....We have a tree company.

i did not see any of the ufos till much later, zooming in on the photo, on the computer...Just the hawk making crazy squawking noises, as if disturbed.

in the photo, the ufos appeared....Or, i sensed, they were travelling east or north-east. now, that i think about it, how would i know their direction.

we have seen another ufo, at night, there in the same location that appeared to dance around the sky and suddenly approach us, very high up. i have never felt such terror and felt secluded, isolated, and thought i only had a groundhog gun in the trailer to aim at it/them. it was late at night.

since i did not see the cluster/fleet of ufos, at the time....I did not stay and observe their direction, etc. i did not know about mufon until this past year, in a book.  i applied a neon application to my photo to enhance the shape and existence of the ufos on my photo, above the hawk. it is about 3,600 feet above sea level, on top of the mountain up there.
content.summary: Zoomed in on hawk with camera, discovered ufo cluster above hawk by accident at a later date

content.detailedDescription: See attachments
content.summary: see attachments

content.detailedDescription: These objects showed up in the photo i took but were not there when i took the picture!  i was at lake gaston with a friend, watching a beautiful sunset from a dock. i took a picture of the sunset and am sure there was nothing in the picture but sunset.  it was totally silent except for the birds and the sound of water lapping the dock and shore, so there was no sound of planes anywhere nearby.  these objects showed up in the picture only which is why i cannot answer a lot of your questions above.   they seem to be diving out of the clouds and both have a dark contrail. even though they have the shape of airplanes their trajectory is strange. when i saw the picture i was stunned. i showed it to several friends and i think they thought they were planes because of their shape, but again, there was nothing in the sky when i took this picture. the person with me didn't see anything but the sunset either. i would love to know what you think.
content.summary: Took picture of sunset - nothing was there. objects showed up in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I took my son to a party .
 at jungle jym's centre .
i have just gone out side for cigaret and i looked up and i saw a plane in the sky going past form the left to the right of me the plane was easy jet .
out side of jungle jym's centre .
just of harborugh hill rd going on to meadow st barnsley  s71 1de 
looking to ward's old mill lane 
and i saw 2 ufo going up ward's in the sky like a s bend in the sky then it shot of to the over plane form the same place and 1 of the ufo stop .
 and was moving the same speed . 
has the plane in front of it .
it must be about half of mile of his nose of it. 
then the 2 ufo shot of and you could see a bortrex  from back of it.
 and went so fast it made a nose like a big bank the 1st ufo went a round the plane not 1 but 2 time's then went i was so shaking i can not believe it what i saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Report ufo sightings online in the uk on the (23 march 2014) time: 14:17

content.detailedDescription:
As i was trying to mow my mom and dad's yard for them before the sun went down i was facing south with my right shoulder towards the benton electric company when the mower just stopped. my mother called for me to come in because the sun was going down.  i fiddled with the riding mower for what seemed to be about 30 seconds. since i couldn't get it started i looked to my left where my mother was standing by the house to let her know that i couldn't get it started. 

it was like a wave of silence hit me as i saw, behind my mom, a hovering cigar shaped object with lights on it in the middle which would shoot out from the center and rotate around the ship. silence, no sound. i jumped off of the mower and ran towards it to grab my mom. i pulled her inside the house, and then all of a sudden started to cry. i locked the door and told my mom and bub to sit down. i grabbed my bb gun and looked out the door glass. i told my mother what was going on, and she tried to take me out the door to show me that nothing was there, but i freaked out too much.

i know have marks on my body in geographic shapes, scars where never injured, and visitations on a regular basis. this was followed by me seeing the ship about a month later while my parents were driving my brother and i to the drive in theater.
content.summary: Cigar shape watching me

content.detailedDescription: Was standing outside, smoking a cigarette when i look up and see this bright reddish hued light moving towards me at a considerably fast speed, as it nears me, bright light fades into a white light, slowly goes out, mechanical whirring-humming sound starts up, and greenish-blue lights start blinking in a pattern, that bleep in a line, then move in another direction. i've never seen before. as it moves over me and the house, whirring stops, lights disappear. the entire time i'm witnessing this, this feeling of complete stillness has me. unable to move, speak, do anything except stare. it felt as if it knew i was there and watching it. the reason i even noticed it is because i smoke every night at the same time, always looking at the sky, and never in my life have i seen anything like that before. i know what airplanes, drones, helicopters, etc look like, and this was definitely not of those.
content.summary: Saw a redish light in the distance, approached, whirring and humming started, redish light turned white, then disappeared, blinking pattern started, then everything disappeared altogether

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in 1973 but i would like to report it in case anyone else saw this at that time.  i was 10 years old but i can still see this as clearly in my mind as if it happened yesterday.  this event made me believe in ufo's throughout the rest of my life.

it was apx. 10:00 p.M. and i was with a family friend in the car as she drove to pick my mother up from work. we had just left the apartment where we lived on fulton st. in houston, tx. (possibly close to fulton and cavalcade)  i was in the passenger seat and was looking out the window as i usually did while riding in the car.  it was dark out and we were driving down a short street with houses on it.  i saw an object on my side of the car, above the trees, that was a circular shape.  i know this because there were red and white circular lights (alternating in color) that were going around the object as they blinked off and on.  they acted similar to christmas runner lights i suppose... the object was stationary in the sky as the lights circled around.  it seemed the lights were going around the bottom of the object... they seemed to be flat - on the underside of whatever this was.  both the red and white lights appeared to be the same size.  the object didn't seem to be right at treetop level but a little bit higher than treetop.

when i saw this object, i immediately alerted our friend that was driving.  we were going slow down this street (a stop sign was a little further ahead) and she looked out and saw the object too.  i don't remember if she leaned over to look out my window or if she saw it from the back passenger window or what.  i just remember that she saw the object too.  she couldn't continue to watch it though because she was driving.  (i spoke with this family friend a few days ago and she said she remembered seeing this object.)

as we continued toward the stop sign, the object began to ascend at an angle away from us.  it just went up and up and up....The lights were still blinking and circling as it went up.  we passed some trees that blocked my view of the object and by the time we got to the stop sign, the object was gone.

this all happened in less than one minute as we drove slowly down a street between our apartment and another road at the stop sign.  the night was clear as i remember.  it was clear enough for me to be able to see this object clearly.
content.summary: Ufo hovered as lights blinked, then ufo ascended at an angle until gone.

content.detailedDescription: Were taking pictures of clouds did not knowof objects untill we looked at the pictures later. the pics were taken by a friend. it so happens i was on the other side of town and took a pic at around the same time. a closer look at my pic zoomed in on object did not kno w was there.
content.summary: Were taking pics of clouds didn't know of objects untill looked at pics later.

content.detailedDescription: The day before i saw a cluster of orbs above the parking lot in uptown whittier, ca. i sent in report #54826.   i returned the next day and they had returned in numbers. also noticed shape changing, white orbs to grey orbs to odd shapes.  even the birds toyed with them. i tried to record, but failed to hit the proper buttons. i still took around 30++ pix. some very dramatic. i am attaching 5.  they are small. so you have to search for them. ga
content.summary: Orbs returned to same area next day, clusters 75+

content.detailedDescription:
While in my car i looked up and saw a light blinking and moving in a semi straight line, although it jumped around the lights continued to blink.
i immediately felt a crazy unknown fear and went inside to immedately report this as it is and will continue all night. i have observed these lights on numerous occasions and have woken up feeling strange and have had panic attacks when i try to recall what had happened the night before.
whatever the case this a live, ongoing event, so if anyone reading this in the ga area, specifically the singleton rd,indian trail area of gwinnett county,, please try to confirm .
im taking a camera later so i might have some video or pics
content.summary: Saw colored lights start jumping around in the sky-if in jimmy carter area{ga} look up!!

content.detailedDescription: Went to let dog out he is puppy notice how clear the sky was walked over to my truck and pan up to sky and seen like the black of the sky start to move looking real hard could barely make it out had dim front light like a dim star leading edges.The triangle like shape had like a heat wave .Like on a hot summer day u can see heat coming off the blacktop .This was real
content.summary: Black tri dim light heat wave behind it

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my boyfriend were facing south at verigin's tomb on terrace road, castlegar, canada. the two dull glowing sphere's appearance occurred around 10:15pm to 10:27pm. the blinking star was happening at least thirty minutes before the orange sphere's made their appearance, took me quite a while to pinpoin blinking's exact location because the pauses were about 20 seconds long.

while we were stargazing, we both saw what appeared to be a white blinking star in the sky south east, it was peculiar because it was flashing like a beacon, with long pauses between each flash, and it was remaining stationary in comparison to the earth rotation, as you know the stars appear to move slowly from west to east, but this 'beacon' was just staying still.

as soon as i was able to pinpoint it's exact location in the sky, thirty minutes later, two dull glowing orange ovals decloaked out of complete no where, horizontally parallel from one another seemingly attached to one another by a grey line, it appeared at around south south east from the lookout, and went past us heading north east along the kootenay river, it appeared to fly over the brilliant dam along its path and then it zipped silently around behind mt.Sentinel.

the two orange spheres seemed to be attached by a white line, as they came toward us, one dull orange ovals rotated under the other all the while still seemingly attached by a grey line, as it dipped into the valley over the river. it then quickly ascended as the other orange oval rotated under the other just before passing over the dam. once over the dam the two dull glowling orange ovals now horizontally from eachother zipped straight with no special maneauvers along the river and behind mt.Sentinel out of sight.

i was immediately filled with a paranoid sensation, a feeling that i needed to get to a more populated area right away, so i got my boyfriend to drive us to seven eleven at this time. after we got there we gathered our wits and then headed to the complex's feild to see if we could spot the blinking light in the sky, but it wasnt there anymore. couldnt fall asleep that night untill 2:30 am i was too spooked.
content.summary: Facing s at verigin's tomb on terrace road, castlegar, canada. while stargazing saw what appeared to be a white blinking star se, as soon as it's location was pinpointed,  two dull glowing orange spheres decloaked sse and went past us headin ne.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 8th at around 10:00 pm i was sitting on my back porch and noticed a single white light appear out of the north over the neighbors treeline.  it was about the size and brightness of a medium star and moving at about the speed of a high altitude jet. i in fact first thought it was a jet, but when two more appeared behind and on either side of it, i thought it was a group of helicopters. the thing i found strange was that the lights did not blink. i see airplanes and helicopters all the time and they always have blinking and colored lights even if they are very high. as i continued to watch another light appeared and then another and another.  they kept coming and coming and soon i was seeing 20 lights, all the same unblinking white color and all on the same loose flight path.  i was only able to track them for a short distance as some low cloud cover was moving in out of the south west.
i am 54 years old and have never seen such a large group of aircraft traveling together, also i would think that that many helicopter would make some sort of sound, but there was none.
content.summary: Observed 20 unblinking white lights traveling in a loose formation

content.detailedDescription:
Time 10:21 pm, date 3/21/2014, nice night outside.  went out on front porch, looking at the sky it was slightly overcast, but you could see stars.  

out of the corner of my eye i spoted a large white light off in the distance.
was moving downwards, thought it might be a fireball or meteor.  but then as fast as it was falling it just stoped about 20 degrees off the horizon.  i noticed a smaller star like object come off the large light and move around the larger object then it too just stoped moving as if hovering.

i was like wow, i want to take a picture of this, but my phone was in the house.  so i ran into the house hoping when i got back outside it would still be there, and it was so i snapped a picture.  not more than a second after i got the photo both objects disappeared, almost like they had burned out.

this object was not close to me, yet it was very large and very bright.
content.summary: Large bright light, with smaller light

content.detailedDescription:
This has been ongoing incident for a many years with many objects in different areas of the sky and each time something different happens. at times it is round at other times the objects spins or changes shape. sometimes the colors are extremely vibrant. there has been times where the colors flash sequential as though it was conveying a message. there have been times when three will pass over and head in different directions then one will come back and stop while the others one by one will fly across in front of it and the other will make a 90 degree turn in front of it. in this video a plane flies underneath the object. there were two more objects on the east side of this location but i was unable to get a picture or video of them even though i tried everything just came out black but very visible to the naked eye.
this video was taken with a nikon coolpix 510 48x zoom on may ���1, ���2013, ������8:25:08 pm in milton ontario the video is in the original format (.Mov) and dscn number count as taken and is untouched. the whirring sound in the video is the sound of the cameras zoom going either in or out.
content.summary: Once again the object appeared for about 15 minutes then left.

content.detailedDescription:
My event is like giving a detailed description of the crop circle the information is in newspaper articles and after working with the epa after 40+ years it appears traces of pcbs are in the area without a doubt as a child i digested the highest quantity i should be dead. even i feel that it's pretty far-fetched the aliens had some compassion from the stupidity of the adults oiling the road with transformer oil

in 1980 my wife and i were married and lived on the third floor across from a large utility substation on december 10, 1981 at 2:47 am utility substation manhole exploded two 40 foot explosions lasting approximately 30 seconds the first one woke me up sound sleep second one i watched from the window approximately 100 feet away in the height of 25 feet as licensed electrician the event gave me a new respect for electricity

14 years ago i change careers modifying home and auto's with people with disabilities i think deep down inside if i help someone in need maybe i get to live another day. my youngest daughter is a science teacher like taking art classes with her we thought it would be fun to apply for grant money for a wellness center in my research i ran across the work from tom bearden he had researched the work done in france on plasma spray for cancer treatment i wish he was alive today so we could have a conversation.

if mufon would like any information i've collected feel free to contact me if there was any strange activity on or before december 10, 1981 i would hope you would share with me

in closing it was probably a blessing i never received any grant money if i had built plasma machine may have caused more harm than good
content.summary: 2:47am dec10 1981 two explosions from a electrical substation  i was 100ft away 25ft up from 40ft plama spay  flash back 12 years dirt road live on was oiled pcb tranfomer oil meny  deaths i am 54 old cancer free?

content.detailedDescription:
*randomly filmed

*i was in a car, no sound was heard because the radio was on.

*i thought it was invisible flying objects.
now i think the big rolling invisible things (left upper corner) are haarp.
ufo's are shooting in and out of clouds, black ones and violet ones. 
different distances. different directions

*some are so incredible fast, you could only see them if you played the video step bij step.

*i felt a little nerveous

* i didnt loose side of it, i filmed 4 minutes, i witness it for an hour and saw reports from other people the lightflashes and ufo's went on at least untill 8pm.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Randomly filmed, haarp rolling clouds, ufo's in any direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking back home from meeting a friend. i had arranged to be picked up from outside my home by another friend at 6.45pm on the 28th of december, 2013, so i know the time was approximately 6.40 to within a couple of minutes. it was dark and as i followed the path home the last part cuts through some unused ground at the side of a railway line. there is no street lighting there so i had turned on the torch on my phone.
 since that particular stretch of pathway is dark you can get a good view of the stars without too much light pollution. i looked up into the sky and saw a star that caught my eye and for a brief moment i thought it was something out of the ordinary. i thought to myself "dammit, i'm never going to see a real ufo". i mention this as i feel it might be related to what happened next.
 when i came to the part of the path where the street lighting begins again i looked down to turn off my torch. at this point i was only 100 yards from my house.
as i looked back up i saw three faint green lights in an equilateral triangle formation hovering/floating about 25 feet above the path directly  (15-20 yards) in front of me. my first thought was "ooh that looks like one of those triangle ufos i've heard about." 
 as the lights began to move i thought for a moment they were perhaps birds flying in formation but it quickly became apparent that it wasn't the case as the lights holding their triangle formation about 7 or 8 feet apart on each side of the triangle began to bank horizontal and at the same time flew from my right to left and down towards the ground in the school playing field to my left. i realised that this was something completely out of the ordinary, and it seemed for a moment that it was about to land as it came down to a height of about 6 feet from the ground but then lifted the front end and executed a 'loop the loop' right in front of me. the loop apex was about 30 feet in the air and as the lights came back around towards the ground, the back 2 lights spread out slightly - like a bird might if it were catching the wind to glide. as it was at the top of the loop it was flying directly towards me and as i realised that i felt that burst of adrenaline that you get when you are scared, but i remained calm and continued watching without moving. then it continued to fly into the playing field at head height and away from me for maybe 30 yards or so and then just kind of vanished or turned its lights off.

 there was no sound the whole time and the lights appeared as small orbs about the size of a football which were kind of like a mist lit from within - a kind of faint woolly green light. the three lights kept the same formation and gave the impression of being held together by some sort of invisible structure - what i assume was a craft of some sort. it was travelling pretty slow - around running speed - what is that maybe 15 or 20 mph? the whole sighting probably lasted only 15 or 20 seconds from start to finish. i don't recall exactly but i'm pretty sure i stopped walking and stood and watched without moving when i spotted it although  i may have taken a few steps towards it before i realised it was something unusual.

 as it disappeared i had the feeling that it was some kind of creature rather than a craft and that it had somehow read my mind and put on the whole display just for me - like it was showing off. i appreciate that those are quite extraordinary claims but the whole thing was way off the chart regarding how weird it was. afterwards i remained standing there trying to figure out what i had seen and if it was some kind of laser display or some kind of trickery - i half expected to hear someone laughing or something. i must have been stood for a good 4 or 5 minutes before i resumed my walk home and just before i left i noticed 2 helicopters in the sky a couple of miles to the north. maybe related-maybe not, but i remember thinking that the whole thing seemed to fit other sighting reports i have read.

 i have never had any other paranormal or ufo related experiences other than a possible ufo sighting about 6 years ago but it was far away and dark and although i think it was a ufo it was too ambiguous for me to make anything of it. however that did lead me to take an interest in the phenomenon as a whole and i have to say i am pleased that i now 'know' that there is at least some legitimacy to ufology.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small triangular craft with green light at each corner gave short, close up aerobatics display then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was a s/sgt in ground control approach at presque isle afb when your jan. 53 event occured.  eagle beak (long range radar site) scrambled four f94f's from presque isle afb.  i tracked the ufo and the fighters.  i remember details that may be interesting. as the pilots approached the targets, a pilot said,"no joy".  the target accelerated rapidly to over 2000mph,based on radar time line sweep markings i made with a grease pencil, for each sweep rotation. then they made a sharp left turn and climbed to over 75000 feet.  

i also was involved with another incident when landing a b26 in ifr conditions.
i was landing the b 26 by gca when a target came out under the aircraft from quaggie joe, a small mountain s of the base.  i pulled the b26 and took him arround.  we were below field minimums with fog.  i called the tower and there were no small a/c in the area to our knowledge. i brought the b26 around and the target came out again but followed the b26 to landing.  the target slowly flew down over the runway in the fog. oscar lyko was in the tower and got pictures when the fog opened for a moment.  we in the gca trailer only saw the green glow and heard the hight pitched squeel when it went north.  we were inteviewed, then were told it was a weather anomoly we had observed on radar.  it was not, we had a cpn-4 gca unit with mti which eliminates the effects of weather on the radar display. i was surprised to see the event in january.

we were never inteviewed on the fighter scamble event. for what it is worth, i hope this helps you.  best wishes,  [name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unknown, radar on jan event,  second due to fog green glow

content.detailedDescription: This was a while back, never knew who to report it to. but any way. a friend of mine and myself were at girard lakes, lower lake. we were working on the boat house because my friend was employed by the city. it was middle of the day, cloudy and light rain. my frined notice something to the north of the lake at a low altitude coming our dirction moving to the south about 500 to 900 feet above the ground. it was a dark metallic disc flying a straight path but was rotating on middle axis. like a frizbe it wobbled from side to top and back. it moved over top the lake and us. the whole we kept asking each other are you seeing what i'm seeing? ocne it paced over top of us it stopped and turn 90 degrees straight up thousands of feet in a second or two. you can see it brake throught the clouds then back down. so it gave me an ideal of its altitude. it came back down to about 500 feet than start flying in a figure 8 paturn in the sky. it then stopped and flew a straight path south ward very fast out of sight. i don't remeber the exact date but fully remember the event.  we told freinds and family, but of course no one believed us. i don't want to diclose my friends name without permition. feal free to contact me. thanks randy
content.summary: Dics object flying low. changed direction rapidly and up in elvation in a second or two.

content.detailedDescription:
This was a while ago, but it has stayed with me all in thehese years and has made me investigate ufo's and watch ufo shows ever since,  even at the risk of sounding "like a loon", and/or being laughed at by friends and family. 
there was an unexpected hurricane that touched down in the area. once it was over and safe for us to go outside, the entire neighborhood went outside to view the damages and to clean up the area of debris. as everything was done, most people started heading into their homes.  before long, it was just one friend and myself outside still chatting. her back was towards the object when i first noticed the colors. i had her turn around and see what i was seeing. we both stood there in silence,  mouths agaped and watched.
it was very large, and seemed to be the bottom of what ever it was. it was off in the distance some ways, but close enough to expect noise from the explostion of it crashing, which is the imprestion that we both got. it was coming down in an arch, slow enough to see that the circle of colors where of the rainbow and very beautiful, but quick enough to expect noise, which there was none. there was also a tail following it in it's wake. the kind you would expect after a commit but the colors where not that of a fire, but of purples and blues. to discribe the object itself would be an outer circle of individual colors with 1 or 3 large circles of colors in the center. 
we both had the impression that it crashed because when it went behind the houses and we could no longer see it, there was a large flash of red light. once again, there was no sound. no explostion. nothing. we stood there, in complete disbelief and bewilderment. later that evening, i had called the local police department to see if there where any plane crashes in thearea. was told no. when asked why, i remember asking if there where any odd or unusual calls for or of crashes, i was laughed at. "what? do you want to report a ufo sighting?"
alot of how i was raised and the beliefs i held had been questioned since then. it's always difficult to discuss with others for the fear of how they will view me afterwards and if i will be labeled a quack.
now, i just want to know what i saw and if anyone else saw what we saw.
content.summary: Wide range of colors with tail falling in an arch out of sky

content.detailedDescription: I didnt really see it till i looked at the picture i took of a jet landing at the navy base in seeley, ca. can you take a look at the picture and let me know what you think??
content.summary: I just took a photo and saw this in the background afterwards

content.detailedDescription: We were heading south on the 5 freeway. we noticed a bright light hoovering  without any movement.It was just outside of the city of roseburg, it was located near a farm and field of cows. it was in the open with no other object or light around or near the object.  we kept an eye on it while driving on the freeway. we found it strange that it was not moving or acting like any aircraft we seen or use to seeing in the sky. we literally drove  underneath the object was hoovering and noticed its lights changing colors and its shape. the object was less then a 2 miles away when we noticed it, it took us 5 mins to reach to location of the hoovering object. once we pass the object we noticed the object started moving ne-nw-ns-n. i had my boyfriend try to take a picture and every time he tried to take it there was a malfunction with my cell phone leading it to a dead battery.  it took us 1 hour to reach our house when usually it only take 30 mins. once we got home, we talked about what we saw and drew pictures of what we saw. both of us were feeling strange and shocked for what we just witnessed for the first time.  a week before we saw the object there was a mysterious black out in our town, according to some towns people there was a car crash on a telephone pole. however, we never found any signs of a car accident or a destroyed electric pole, or the victim of the crash. a week later our town was hit by lighting and the douglas county complex fire started, same morning we had the city fire department and  military in our town aiding with the fire. since then, we never seen such object again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Can the douglas complex fire do with an ufo crash????

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) was in a vehicle traveling westward on warren ave near southfield fwy in dearborn, mi.  witness observed to the south, a very bright white egg shaped object traveling slowly southward.  the sighting duration lasted about 15 seconds, traveling at approximately commercial aircraft altitude and speed.
content.summary: Bright white egg shaped object traveling in southerly direction, short duration of 15 seconds
